About Me

I'm Bob_Sniz, an aspiring data analyst and passionate programmer skilled in Python, C++, Java, and Dart (Flutter). Currently, I'm deepening my expertise through the IBM Data Science with Python certification and exploring mobile development with Flutter. My ambition is to grow into a globally recognized computer programmer and a skilled Computer Security Analyst, combining software development with data-driven problem solving and cybersecurity awareness. I’m driven by curiosity, continuous learning, and the goal of building solutions that matter.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
